name: Red-headed Space Cowgirl gets the Blues
name_original: Red-headed Space Cowgirl gets the Blues
description:
Jessa is a space cowgirl, responsible for ranging in the inhospitable Alcan wilds. A hiker has gone lost. It’s her job - and yours - to pick up the trail.

Controls - use the arrow keys to move left and right, mouse to click on interactive buttons.

(if you get stuck, the path always continues on the right!)

Attributions:

created from the original “runners” background, submitted by Dylan Squires on Open Game Art http://opengameart.org/content/several-scrolling-...

by http://www.meowx.com/

**all assets used or used for direct inspiration were Creative Commons licensed and open source**
